mdRecord.dcterms:title: La declaration de nostre sainct Pere le Pape Sixtus cinquiesme: A l'encontre de Henry de Bourbon, soy disant Roy de Nauarre, & semblablement de Bourbon, pretendu Prince de Condé heretiques, contre leurs posteritez & successeurs: par laquelle tous leurs sujects sont declarez absous, de tous serments qu'ils leurs auroient iuré faict ou promis
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Catholic Church. Pope (1585-1590 : Sixtus V)
Chambolle-Duru (Firm)
Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Sixtus V, Pope, 1520-1590
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Published in Latin under title: Sanctiss. d.n. Sixti papae V, declaratio. Contra Henricum Borbonium assertum regem Nauarrae ...--Cf. Lindsay & Neu.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Chambolle-Duru. Unidentified armorial binding, with monogram "RB" or "BR" and motto "In via nulla in via" inside both covers, in each corner.
